name: Unearthed
description:
UNEARTHED is a puzzle game. This game tells a story about a scientist that stumbles upon a cave. He found puzzles where he needs to turn on every energy tool that is in the puzzle.In this pyramid, he uncovers something special. Finish the puzzles and uncover the secret.

Train your problem solving skill and finish all the puzzles.

Developers
Programmer - Geizka Wahyu Fahriza - geizka.fahriza@gmail.com
